item.title: Trump begins demolishing East Wing of the White House to erect a $250 million ballroom that doesn’t have federal approval
item.description: “Nothing will be torn down,” White House Press Secretary Caroline Leavitt said when she announced the project in July.

item.title: Daylight saving time is about to end—and so is your team’s focus. The extra hour of ‘sleep’ actually tanks productivity, energy levels, and motivation
item.description: Despite President Trump’s calls to scrap daylight saving, it’s still in effect across most of the U.S.—here’s how an expert says workers can stay prod...

item.title: OpenAI looks to replace the drudgery of junior bankers’ workload
item.description: OpenAI has over 100 ex-investment bankers helping train its AI as part of a secretive project code-named Mercury, according to documents seen by Bloom...

item.title: Companies pressured by anxious bull market to justify sky-high valuations during crucial earnings season
item.description: As earnings season kicks off, investors want proof that profits, not just optimism, are driving the rally.

item.title: Trump vows to reach ‘fantastic deal’ with China, saying the U.S. commands ‘great respect’ from Beijing
item.description: "It’s going to be a great trade deal. It’s going to be fantastic for both countries, and it’s going to be fantastic for the entire world.”
